title: RUSH SALE near Airport 1BR with Unmatched Amenity View at Azure Urban Resort Residences, Parañaque City
description:
A Prime Urban Oasis Awaits You at Azure Urban Resort Residences
Imagine waking up to a stunning view of a man-made beach and lush greenery from your own private balcony. This isn't a vacation fantasy; it's your daily reality at the Azure Urban Resort Residences!

Your New Home: A Rare Find
We're offering a pristine, almost-new one-bedroom unit with a balcony on the 15th floor of Azure. Spanning 28.28 sqm, this unit offers the perfect blend of comfort and style. The best part? It faces the breathtaking amenities, giving you a daily dose of resort-style living. This unit has been seldom used and has never been tenanted, ensuring it's in immaculate condition and ready for you to move in. All of this can be yours for ₱3.9M.

Azure's World-Class Highlights
Azure is more than just a condominium; it's a lifestyle destination. You'll have exclusive access to a wide array of world-class amenities, including:
 * Paris Beach Club: A stunning, three-story masterpiece designed by international celebrity Paris Hilton.
 * Man-made Beach: Relax and swim in a unique, man-made beach with powdery white sand.
 * Lap and Wave Pools: Enjoy a refreshing dip in the lap pool or have fun with the family in the wave pool.
 * Roof Deck: Get a 360-degree view of the city from the breathtaking roof deck.
 * Multiple Sports Facilities: Stay active with a basketball court, tennis court, and a gym.

Strategically Located for Your Convenience
Living at Azure means you're always close to where you need to be. The resort residences are strategically located with easy access to major transportation hubs, commercial centers, and essential services. You'll be minutes away from:
 * Shopping and Dining: SM City Bicutan is just a stone's throw away, offering a wide variety of shopping, dining, and entertainment options.
 * Healthcare: Reputable hospitals and clinics are easily accessible for your peace of mind.
 * Education: Prestigious schools and universities are a short commute away.
 * Travel: The Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA) is only a few kilometers away, perfect for frequent travelers.

Who Is This Property For?
This property is ideal for young professionals, couples, and entrepreneurs who desire a resort-style living experience without leaving the city. It's also a great investment for those in professions that require frequent travel or those who work in nearby business districts and want a convenient and luxurious retreat after a long day. Whether you're a pilot, flight attendant, doctor, lawyer, or a start-up owner, this property offers the perfect balance of work and play.

Ready to make this dream your reality? Don't miss out on this rare opportunity to own a piece of paradise in the city.

DEAL ONLY WITH LICENSED REAL ESTATE PRACTITIONERS

Republic Act 9646 or the Real Estate Service Act
SEC. 29. Prohibition Against the Unauthorized Practice of Real Estate Service. No person shall practice or offer to practice real estate service in the Philippines..unless a holder of a valid certificate of registration, and professional identification card.. Any violation of this Act shall be meted the penalty of a fine of not less than One hundred thousand pesos (P100,000.00) or imprisonment of not less than two (2) years, or both. In case the violation is committed by an unlicensed real estate service practitioner, the penalty shall be double the aforesaid fine and imprisonment.

title: Huge 4-br condo in Cleveland Tower (near MOA/Okada). 360 sqm
description:
Location, location, location!

Breathtaking view of Manila Bay. 5-minute walk to Okada Manila. A hop and a skip to the beach. A stone's throw to Mall of Asia area. A few minutes to the airport. A short drive to Makati and BGC. What else can you ask for? 

If space is a luxury, then this unit is ultimate indulgence. Take care of both your mental and physical well-being in this 360 sqm of living space, 24/7 grand vista and daily dose of fresh air.

Best of all, this unit sells for waaaaaaay below zonal value. Zonal value as of Aug 2023 is P120k/sqm for the unit alone (P43.3 million). Tandem parking is thrown in for free.

Unit will require some repair. Building is over 20 years old but is very well-maintained, with classy lobby.

title: Rental Ready Condo
description:
COPETON BAYSUITES:  Your Smart Investment in Luxury Living- Rental Ready Investment
COPETON BAYSUITES is more than just a luxurious residential development; it's a smart investment opportunity in the heart of Bay City, Manila. This project offers three 16-storey towers with a prime location and thoughtfully designed units that cater to both lifestyle and financial goals.

Location:
Located on Macapagal Boulevard, COPETON BAYSUITES sits at the center of Bay City's vibrant lifestyle scene.  You'll have easy access to:
- Ayala Mall:  Enjoy world-class shopping and dining.
- IKEA:  Find all your home and lifestyle needs.
- City of Dreams: Experience the thrill of gaming and entertainment.
- Parqal Mall: Explore diverse shopping, dining, and entertainment options.
- Mall of Asia:  Enjoy the Philippines' largest mall with endless retail, dining, and entertainment choices.
- Solaire:  Experience the excitement of world-class gaming and entertainment.
Unit Options:

COPETON BAYSUITES offers a variety of unit options to suit your needs:
- Studio:  Perfect for individuals or couples seeking a stylish and compact living space.
- 1 Bedroom:  Ideal for small families or those who value privacy and space.
- 2 Bedroom:  Spacious and comfortable, perfect for growing families or those who enjoy entertaining.
- 3 Bedroom:  Spacious and luxurious, offering ample room for families and guests.
- 4 Bedroom:  The ultimate in luxury living, providing ample space and comfort for large families or those who enjoy lavish living.

Smart Investment Features:
COPETON BAYSUITES goes beyond luxury living by providing features that maximize your investment

 potential:
- Fully Furnished & Fully Fitted:  Move in with ease and enjoy a luxurious living experience right away.
- Smart Home:  Enjoy the convenience and efficiency of a smart home system, enhancing comfort and security.

- Rental Ready:  Units are designed for easy rental, ensuring a steady stream of income.
- Operational Efficiency:  Minimize operating costs with energy-efficient features and smart home technology.

- Income Sustainable:  Enjoy long-term, stable rental income potential.
- No Renovational Expenses:  Move in without the hassle and expense of renovations.
- No Additional Expenses:  Enjoy peace of mind with no hidden fees or additional costs.

title: Move-In-Ready For Sale - 1BR in Azure Urban Resort, Paranaque, Manila | Best Realtor
Discounted 31.62 sqm Seaview City Studio Condo for Sale in Aseana City Marina Bay Paranaque City
description:
Seaview City Studio Condo for Sale in Aseana City Marina Bay Parañaque City
29.05 to 40.76 sqm | Seaside Studio Living Minutes from NAIA

What happens when world-class design meets a front-row seat to Manila Bay?
You get Seaview City’s Studio Units—a rare gem in Aseana City Marina Bay Parañaque, where lifestyle, location, and long-term value merge into one striking address.

Welcome to the Studio Units of Seaview City, the only in-city, bayfront residential address where design, location, and long-term value converge effortlessly. With smart layouts ranging from 29.05 to 40.76 sqm, these well-appointed units prove that luxury doesn’t need to be large to feel grand—it just needs to be intelligently built.

✅ Balcony's floor-to-ceiling sliding door with Manila Bay’s soft light filtering in
✅ 3.2–4.2 meter high ceilings for an unmatched sense of space
✅ Modern kitchen, branded fittings, and ultra-premium turnover finishes
✅ Smart lock systems with keycard/fingerprint/pincode entry
✅ Designed for rental, resale, or end-use flexibility

Located within the Coastal Economic Zone, Seaview City is not just another address. It’s a future-ready investment with direct access to CAVITEX, only 2 minutes across Okada Manila, and just 10–15 minutes from NAIA Terminals 1, 2, and 3—making it ideal for business travelers, young professionals, overseas Filipinos, and discerning property investors.

These Studio Units are perfect for:
— First-time buyers looking to invest in a future landmark
— Savvy investors planning for short-term rental income
— Frequent flyers wanting a secure, stylish base just minutes from the airport

And here's the kicker: You’re entering at Phase 1 pricing, with values forecasted to appreciate 20%–35% over the next 3–5 years.

🔑 Ready to See the Views That Photos Can’t Capture?

Photos and listings can only say so much—you have to stand in a Seaview City Studio Unit to understand what makes it extraordinary.
So let’s not make this just another saved post on your phone. Come visit.

📍Book your Private Model Unit Tour in Aseana City Marina Bay Paranaque today.

Join us for an exclusive Model Unit Tour at Seaview City.
You’ll experience what the renderings can’t show: how it feels to stand in a unit that’s both smart in size and sharp in ROI potential.

📍SEASIDE. Prestigious. Pre-selling.

3 Bedroom Condo for sale in Parañaque, Metro Manila

Bayview International Tower

Roxas Blvd., Parañaque City

  Laundry Area

  Balcony with view

  Plus parking slot





*** CURRENTLY WITH TENANT




Bayview International Tower is a 20-storey residential condominium in Parañaque City. This friendly community boasts of features to ensure your safety and convenience at all times. These include a security monitoring system, ample water supply, sprinkler and smoke detection system, garbage chute, stair pressurization system, standby power generator, parking garage, and three elevators. Some of its amenities include a swimming pool, outdoor Jacuzzi, health club, game room, children’s playground, helipad, and multi-purpose hall. Nestled along Roxas Boulevard, Bayview International Tower is close to entertainment and shopping hubs such as Coastal Mall and SM Mall of Asia.

title: FOR SALE 1 BR BARE UNIT AT LIONS PARK RESIDENCES STA ANA SUN VALLEY PARAÑAQUE
description:
Lions park residences condominium in sta ana drive sunvalley paranaque 1 bEdroom unit for sale at 2.1M clean title
 30sqm unit
 

 Experience relaxed suburban living at Lions Park Residences. Located in Barangay Sun Valley in Bicutan, Parañaque, the exclusive Lions Park Residences offers both seclusion and easy access to the business and lifestyle hubs of Bonifacio Global City and Makati City and near the NAIA terminals. The 1.9-hectare residential community features seven low-rise condominiums buildings set amid spacious green spaces.
 

 Lions Park Residences provides plenty of green, open spaces that allow for a relaxing walk, run or bike ride. The outdoor swimming pool and landscaped park are also available for our residents’ enjoyment.
 

 Live in a safe and comfortable community with services provided by Quadrillion Property Management, Inc. (QMPI).
 24/7 security
 CCTV in common areas
 Facilities maintenance and repairs
 Garbage collection
 Resident activities
 

 Enjoy the accessibility and convenience of city living while enjoying the relaxing vibes of your private urban getaway.

description:
COPETON BAYSUITES:  💎💎💎
Your Smart Investment in Luxury Living
 
COPETON BAYSUITES is more than just a luxurious residential development; it's a smart investment opportunity in the heart of Bay City, Manila. This project offers three 16-storey towers with a prime location and thoughtfully designed units that cater to both lifestyle and financial goals.
 
💎Location:
 
📍Located on Macapagal Boulevard, COPETON BAYSUITES sits at the center of Bay City's vibrant lifestyle scene.  You'll have easy access to:
 
🥇Ayala Mall:  Enjoy world-class shopping and dining.
🥇IKEA:  Find all your home and lifestyle needs.
🥇City of Dreams: Experience the thrill of gaming and entertainment.
🥇Parqal Mall: Explore diverse shopping, dining, and entertainment options.
🥇Mall of Asia:  Enjoy the Philippines' largest mall with endless retail, dining, and entertainment choices.
🥇Solaire:  Experience the excitement of world-class gaming and entertainment.
 
💎Unit Options:
 
COPETON BAYSUITES offers a variety of unit options to suit your needs:
 
🔑Studio:  Perfect for individuals or couples seeking a stylish and compact living space.
🔑Studio w/ Balcony: Ideal for small families or those who value privacy and space.
🔑2 Bedroom:  Spacious and comfortable, perfect for growing families or those who enjoy entertaining.
🔑3 Bedroom:  Spacious and luxurious, offering ample room for families and guests.
🔑4 Bedroom:  The ultimate in luxury living, providing ample space and comfort for large families or those who enjoy lavish living.
 
💎Smart Investment Features:
 
COPETON BAYSUITES goes beyond luxury living by providing features that maximize your investment potential:
 
🏆Fully Furnished & Fully Fitted:  Move in with ease and enjoy a luxurious living experience right away.
🏆Smart Home:  Enjoy the convenience and efficiency of a smart home system, enhancing comfort and security.
🏆Rental Ready:  Units are designed for easy rental, ensuring a steady stream of income.
🏆Operational Efficiency:  Minimize operating costs with energy-efficient features and smart home technology.
🏆Income Sustainable:  Enjoy long-term, stable rental income potential.
🏆No Renovational Expenses:  Move in without the hassle and expense of renovations.
🏆No Additional Expenses:  Enjoy peace of mind with no hidden fees or additional costs.

A three (3) tower residential condominium. 
✅West Tower
✅North Tower
✅South Tower

𝓡𝓮𝓷𝓽𝓿𝓮𝓼𝓽𝓶𝓮𝓷𝓽

Santos Avenue (formerly Sucat Road) and access to South Luzon Expressway (SLEX) makes it easy to travel to other parts of Metro Manila and nearby provinces.
 *Siena Park Residences is also just a short drive from Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA), which is advantageous for business professionals and travelers.
 *Siena Park Residences offers various amenities such as swimming pools, fitness centers, jogging paths, and children's play areas, providing a complete and modern living experience for residents.

 *Siena Park Residences is developed by DMCI Homes, one of the most trusted and reputable real estate developers in the Philippines. DMCI Homes is known for its commitment to delivering high-quality developments with a focus on resort-style living and strong community-building elements.

title: Condo Unit Near Airport Studio No downpayment
description:
𝐀𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐖𝐨𝐨𝐝𝐬𝐯𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐞 𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐭 𝐛𝐲 𝐑𝐋𝐂 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐬

Enjoy a balanced living experience at Woodsville Crest, a 9-story vertical development in Merville, Parañaque. This project encapsulates nature-inspired living at the heart of the metro, providing residents with a safe and serene haven at the end of a busy day. 



Woodsville Crest offers the following unit types:

studio
1-bedroom
2-bedroom


𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬, 𝐀𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐇𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐬

Woodsville Crest helps residents achieve a well-balanced lifestyle through fiber optic-ready units, work-from-home provisions, and other upgraded home innovations to work comfortably within their units. After a busy day at work, residents can take a break at the pool area, landscaped areas, wellness trails, and picnic groves. Fitness enthusiasts can also break a sweat at the jogging trails and fitness center.



Other amenities that facilitate a healthy work-life balance at Woodsville Crest include:

Grill station
Function rooms
Work lounge
Game room
Indoor and outdoor play areas
Pet park
Day care facility

title: FOR SALE 2 BEDROOM UNIT WITH PARKING AT AZURE URBAN RESORT RESIDENCE
description:
🌴 Discover Paradise at Azure Urban Resort Residences! 🌴

Escape to a tropical oasis in the heart of the city! Azure Urban Resort Residences offers a unique blend of luxury and relaxation, perfect for those who crave a serene getaway without leaving the metro.

🏖️ Beach-Inspired Living: Dive into our stunning man-made beach, complete with fine white sand and crystal-clear waters. It’s the perfect spot to unwind and soak up the sun.

🏊 World-Class Amenities: Enjoy our wave pool, lap pool, and kiddie pool, or relax in our spa and wellness center. There’s something for everyone!

🌇 Prime Location: Situated in Parañaque City, Azure is just minutes away from top shopping centers, dining destinations, and entertainment hubs. Convenience meets luxury!

🏡 Stylish Residences: Choose from a variety of beautifully designed units, each offering breathtaking views and modern comforts. Your dream home awaits!

🌟 Exclusive Perks: Residents enjoy access to our private beach club, fitness center, and a host of other exclusive amenities. Live the resort lifestyle every day!

Don’t miss out on the chance to experience resort living at its finest. Book a tour today and see why Azure Urban Resort Residences is the ultimate urban escape!

📞 Contact Us: Call or message us for more information.

Azure Urban Resort Residences – Where Every Day Feels Like a Vacation. 🌞

title: 1BEDROOM UNIT FULLY FURNISHED
description:
Start your November holidays with Gold City Good Home Promo!

We're thrilled to announce that we will reopen our 230k Good Home Furnishing Promo. This special offer is available for the first 10 Gold City units reserved from November 2-4, 2024.


GUIDELINES:

1. Allocation: 10 units per project (Gold Residences Phase 1, Gold Residences Phase 2, Gold Towers Residential-Offices)
2. Eligibility: Open to both International and Local Sales.
3. Reservation Locations:
Reservations must be made at any Gold Showrooms (across NAIA Terminal 1 or MOA) with both the buyer and seller present.
Note: The Gold Towers Residential-Offices Showroom is at MOA North Showroom, but you can finalize your reservation at MOA South Showroom.
4. For Buyers Outside NCR: An authorized representative may accompany the seller on your behalf (please provide a signed authorization letter, the principal buyer’s valid ID, and the representative’s valid ID).
5. For Buyers Abroad: Reservation fee payments must be made through our international payment channels.
6. Exclusions: This promo is not applicable to SERP.
7. Submission Deadlines: All documents shall be submitted to PD Booking Team until November 4, 2024 (6:00 PM).

Please take this opportunity while the offer lasts. 

*The Good Home Package will be provided upon the LSB of the account. A list of appliances included in the 230k package will be issued soon

HURRY UP! OWN A UNIT NOW!

title: 2 Bedroom unit RFO at Gentry Manor
description:
Invest in the Future: Gentry Manor, Your Gateway to the Las Vegas of Asia 


Attention savvy investors and discerning buyers!  Are you looking for a prime real estate opportunity with incredible potential for both appreciation and passive income? Look no further than Gentry Manor, the newest condominium development in Megaworld's Westside City, the burgeoning "Las Vegas of Asia." 

Location, Location, Location: 

Gentry Manor enjoys an unparalleled location, situated just steps away from the iconic Okada Manila casino and hotel. This prime spot puts you at the heart of the action in Westside City, a thriving entertainment hub rapidly transforming into a world-class destination. 

The Future is Bright: 

Megaworld's vision for Westside City is ambitious and exciting. This master-planned township is poised to become the Philippines' premier entertainment destination, drawing inspiration from the vibrant energy of Las Vegas. 

  

Here's why Gentry Manor is a winning investment: 

- Prime Location:  Just steps from Okada Manila, within walking distance of Resorts World Manila, and a short drive from Solaire Resort & Casino and City of Dreams Manila. 

 
- Unparalleled Convenience:  Enjoy easy access to major roads, the airport terminal via a dedicated ramp entry, and proximity to essential amenities like St. Luke's Hospital, Landers Superstore, and a DFA office. 

 
- Proven Appreciation:  The area is experiencing significant property appreciation, ensuring a solid return on your investment. 


- Passive Income Potential:  Gentry Manor's proximity to Okada Manila presents a unique opportunity for Airbnb and staycation businesses. Offer guests a more affordable and equally luxurious alternative to Okada's hotel, complete with a stunning lobby, top-notch amenities, a bi-level gym, and breathtaking landscaping. 

Don't Miss Out! 


This is your chance to secure a piece of the future in Westside City. Contact us today to learn more about Gentry Manor and explore our exciting promotions, discounts, and flexible payment terms. 

Invest in your future. Invest in Gentry Manor. 

Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity! 
Contact Mary Tan today to learn more:

title: 2BR END UNIT WITH BALCONY RFO CONDO FOR SALE IN SUCAT NEAR SM SUCAT
description:
SMDC Field Residences offers five star sub urban living south of the metro. From young to growing families, SMDC Field Residences offers a wide array of living options suited for your needs and lifestyles. Relax and bond with your loved ones at the development’s host of excellent amenities. 




For convenience, SM Sucat is right in front of your home and international and local airports are right nearby. Dining and shopping options abound as the Entertainment City is a short drive away.

Designed for utmost relaxation and convenience in mind, SMDC Field Residences’ strategic location, wide open spaces and generously sized amenities offers families spaces to thrive and grow.




ADDRESS: Field Residences – Dr. A. Santos Avenue, Brgy. San Dionisio, Sucat, Parañaque City, Philippines




PROPERTY SIZE: 7.8 hectare

NUMBER OF BUILDINGS: 10

NUMBER OF STOREYS: 8-12




SMDC FIELD RESIDENCES | Building Facilities & Amenities

Everyday living is anything but ordinary, enjoy resort-like amenities and impressive facilities that include the following:




BUILDING FACILITIES & UTILITIES

2-3 elevators per building

Fire exits

Mail room

Garbage disposal area on every floor

Automatic fire detection and alarm system

Standby generator set for common areas and selected residential outlet

Covered drop-off area

SERVICES

24-hour security

CCTV system on selected areas

Front desk

Property management services




A M E N I T I E S

Swimming pools

Lobby

Lounge

Function room

Picnic area

Children’s play area

Open playfield

Jogging path

Basketball court

Badminton court




15%-20% DISCOUNT  - TOTAL OF 1,100,705.00PHP




RENT TO OWN TERMS




5% SPOT DOWNPAYMENT TO MOVE-IN AMOUNTING TO 245,661.52php

15% MONTHLY AMORTIZATION FOR 22 MONTHS AMOUNTING TO 37,590.21php

80% BALANCE THRU BANK FINANCING




NO NEED C.I UPON BOOKING!




Have your own pad now at Field Residences!

title: Avida Towers Sucat - Comfortable and Convenient Living in Parañaque City
description:
Avida Towers Sucat is a residential condominium development by Avida Land, located along Dr. A. Santos Avenue in Parañaque City. This mid-rise project offers a balanced lifestyle, combining the comforts of a suburban environment with the convenience of city living. Avida Towers Sucat is designed for individuals and families who desire a practical and accessible home, with a range of amenities and proximity to key destinations in Metro Manila.

𝗞𝗲𝘆 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀:
● 𝗣𝗿𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗟𝗼𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Avida Towers Sucat is strategically situated near major thoroughfares, including SLEX (South Luzon Expressway) and Skyway, providing easy access to business districts such as Makati, Alabang, and Bonifacio Global City. It's also close to various establishments like SM City BF Parañaque, S&R Membership Shopping, hospitals, schools, and the Ninoy Aquino International Airport, making it convenient for daily commutes and errands.
● 𝗠𝗼𝗱𝗲𝗿𝗻 𝗔𝗺𝗲𝗻𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗲𝘀: The development offers a variety of amenities designed to enhance the quality of life for its residents, including:
● 𝗦𝘄𝗶𝗺𝗺𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗣𝗼𝗼𝗹: Ideal for relaxation and leisure activities.
● 𝗖𝗵𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗿𝗲𝗻’𝘀 𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘆 𝗔𝗿𝗲𝗮: Providing a safe and engaging environment for kids.
● 𝗠𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶-𝗣𝘂𝗿𝗽𝗼𝘀𝗲 𝗛𝗮𝗹𝗹: Suitable for social gatherings and community events.
● 𝗟𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗽𝗲𝗱 𝗚𝗮𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗻𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗢𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗦𝗽𝗮𝗰𝗲𝘀: Creating a refreshing atmosphere within the complex.
● 𝗝𝗼𝗴𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗣𝗮𝘁𝗵 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗢𝘂𝘁𝗱𝗼𝗼𝗿 𝗙𝗶𝘁𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗔𝗿𝗲𝗮: Encouraging an active and healthy lifestyle.
● 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗿𝘆 𝗟𝗶𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗦𝗽𝗮𝗰𝗲𝘀: Avida Towers Sucat offers a range of unit types, including studio, one-bedroom, and two-bedroom units. Each unit is designed with functionality and comfort in mind, featuring modern finishes and efficient layouts that maximize space and natural light. Selected units come with balconies that offer views of the city and surrounding areas.
● 𝗦𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗟𝗶𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴: The development ensures a secure environment with 24/7 security, CCTV surveillance, and a dedicated property management team. It also provides ample parking spaces and has retail options within the complex for added convenience.

𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗖𝗵𝗼𝗼𝘀𝗲 𝗔𝘃𝗶𝗱𝗮 𝗧𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗦𝘂𝗰𝗮𝘁?
Avida Towers Sucat is ideal for those seeking a practical and accessible living space in Parañaque City. Its strategic location, range of amenities, and well-designed units make it an excellent choice for young professionals, families, and investors looking for a comfortable urban lifestyle.

title: Woodsville Crest - Your Oasis in the City
description:
Woodsville Crest in Merville, Parañaque City, is designed for those seeking a harmonious balance between urban convenience and suburban tranquility. This 8-building mid-rise condominium project by Robinsons Land offers modern, contemporary-themed living spaces across a 3.26-hectare property. It's strategically positioned near South Luzon Expressway, offering residents unparalleled access to key locations, making it ideal for professionals and families alike​.

𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐀𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬:
● 𝐏𝐫𝐢𝐦𝐞 𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Situated in Merville, Parañaque City, Woodsville Crest provides easy access to commercial centers, schools, hospitals, and even transportation hubs like Ninoy Aquino International Airport. It's close to major establishments such as SM Hypermarket, Waltermart Sucat, and Asian Hospital and Medical Center, offering a convenient lifestyle within reach.
● 𝐍𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞-𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐩𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐝 𝐋𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠: Designed with sustainability in mind, Woodsville Crest incorporates nature-inspired amenities to support a balanced and elevated lifestyle. It offers a serene environment with landscaped areas, a lap pool, kids' indoor play area, fitness gym, co-working space, outdoor lounge, BBQ grilling area, and more, making it a perfect retreat within the city.
● 𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞: Residents' safety and comfort are prioritized with 24/7 roving security, CCTV cameras, and a dedicated Property Management Office to ensure the upkeep of common areas and assist with utilities. The development also features elevators, centralized garbage disposal, a sewage treatment facility, and backup power in common areas.

𝐀𝐟𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐝𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐋𝐮𝐱𝐮𝐫𝐲:
Woodsville Crest offers upscale living with various unit types, including studio, 1-bedroom, and 2-bedroom options. Starting at ₱18,000++/month, it presents an opportunity for an exclusive and distinctive living experience, making it an attractive option for those looking to invest in a modern yet nature-friendly community​.

𝐀 𝐋𝐢𝐟𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐲𝐥𝐞 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐄𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐅𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐨:
Whether you’re a young professional or starting a family, Woodsville Crest provides a peaceful environment that doesn’t compromise on modern comforts. It’s an oasis where you can enjoy the perks of urban living while being surrounded by green spaces and thoughtfully designed amenities. This is more than just a home; it's a lifestyle that promotes well-being and community connection.

Take the Next Step: Embrace the perfect blend of city and nature at Woodsville Crest. Contact us today to discover how you can make this vibrant community your new home.

Convenient Access: Close to premier shopping centers, fine dining restaurants, entertainment venues, and essential services. Steps away from Solaire and Okada Manila.
Resort-Style Living: Experience the ultimate blend of luxury, comfort, and breathtaking natural beauty.

Modern Living at Woodsville Crest: Studio, 1BR, and 2BR Units for Sale in Parañaque
description:
🏢 Woodsville Crest Olive Building: Your Modern Living Sanctuary in Parañaque City! 🌿
 
🌟 Location: Edison Avenue, Merville, Parañaque City
 
🏗️ General Description:
 
- ✅️ Experience contemporary architectural design at its finest
- ✅️ Concrete façade adorned with elegant glass windows
- ✅️ Choose from a selection of Studio, 1-Bedroom, and 2-Bedroom units
 
💰 Payment Terms:
 
- 99% Cash with 1% Balance - 15% discount
- 100% payable in 67 months - 12% discount
- 10% Downpayment, 20% Payable in 65 months, 70% Payable on the 67th month - 5.5% discount
- Additional 5% discount on top of the Total Contract Price
 
🏢 Building Facilities/Services:
 
- ✅️ Welcoming main entrance lobby with a reception counter on the Garden Floor
- ✅️ Two elevators for convenience: One passenger and One service cum passenger
- ✅️ CCTV monitoring in selected common areas for added security
- ✅️ Annunciator panel and emergency speaker for peace of mind
- ✅️ Elevated water tank and underground cistern for uninterrupted water supply
- ✅️ Standby power generator ensuring power in all common areas
- ✅️ Stay connected with Wi-Fi in selected amenity areas
- ✅️ Individual mailboxes for each resident
- ✅️ Centralized garbage holding room and per residential floor
- ✅️ Building administration office for your convenience
- ✅️ Bicycle parking slots and storage facilities at the Basement Level
- ✅️ Security room for enhanced safety measures
- ✅️ Common drying area at the Roof Deck
- ✅️ Transformer and Genset Room for power backup
- ✅️ Sewage Treatment Plant for environmental sustainability
- ✅️ Two fire exit stairs with well-lighted signages, meeting safety standards
 
Embrace the essence of modern living at Woodsville Crest Olive Building! 🌿🏢🔑

title: Studio Unit for Sale in Clara Building, Amaia Steps Sucat, Parañaque
description:
Studio Unit for Sale in Clara Building, Amaia Steps Sucat, Parañaque
 

 Ref No: BCRC276
 Floor: 8th
 FA: 23 sqm
 Bathroom: 1
 BARE
 

 Selling Prince: 3,200,000.00 inclusive of CGT and broker’s fee
 *Terms: Cash Payment or Assumption of Mortgage
 

 Welcome to Amaia Steps Sucat, a modern and contemporary inspired mid-rise residential project with support retail shops set against the tranquil surroundings of Parañaque City. Located in Dr. Arcadio Santos Ave. in San Antonio, living in Amaia Steps Sucat means feeling and experiencing the prosperous ambiance of Parañaque City. It’s an ever-booming city where the 2-hectare project of flood-free land is found. Studio, Deluxe to Premier units are equipped with features that make it a modern sanctuary.
 

 At Amaia Land, easy and flexible payment terms are offered so you can finally have the chance to have your own home. So take the right step, now!
 

 Amaia Steps Sucat is located along Dr. A. Santos Avenue, Brgy. San Antonio, Paranaque City. Accessible from South Luzon Express Way via Sucat Exit, from West Service Road and from NAIA Road Transport stations are readily available in the area such as jeepneys and shuttle services. Close to various commercial establishments such as SM City Sucat, Puregold and Santana Grove. 30 minutes away from Makati Central Business District via Skyway.

title: For Sale: Your Paranque Lifestyle Starter – A Semi-Furnished Condo in Woodsville Viverde Mansions
description:
Are you a busy professional or lifestyle seeker looking for a convenient and comfortable home base in Paranaque? As an information-driven Real Estate Broker, I present this charming 1-bedroom condo in Woodsville Viverde Mansions, a property that offers both comfort and a strategic investment opportunity.

Property Highlights:

✅️ Ideal Location:

      ✅️ West Service Road, Merville, Paranaque: A well-connected location with easy access to major routes and destinations.

      ✅️ Proximity to NAIA 3 (4.8 km), BGC (7.8 km), and Makati CBD (8.7 km): Perfect for frequent travelers and those who work in these bustling areas.

✅️ Comfortable Living Space:

      ✅️ Building 2: A well-maintained and secure building.

      ✅️ 1 Bedroom, 1 Toilet and Bath: Ideal for individuals or couples.

      ✅️ 44.69 sqm: A well-proportioned layout for a comfortable lifestyle.

      ✅️ Semi-furnished (Bed, Refrigerator, Microwave): Move-in ready with essential appliances.

✅️ Modern Amenities: Pool with Kiddie Pool, Multi-Purpose Hall, Indoor Gym: Enjoy relaxation and recreation without leaving the building.

✅️ Asking Price: Php 4.090M (Four Million Ninety Thousand Pesos)


Why Choose This Condo?

    ✅️ Strategic Location: Enjoy the convenience of city living while having easy access to key destinations in Metro Manila.

    ✅️ Investment Potential: Woodsville Viverde Mansions is a sought-after development, making this condo a smart investment for the future.

    ✅️ Lifestyle Upgrade: Amenities like the pool and gym offer a convenient way to relax and stay active.

    ✅️ Ready to Move In: The semi-furnished unit allows for a hassle-free transition to your new home.


Your Trusted Real Estate Advisor

My name is Oliver M. Liwanag, and my approach to real estate is all about empowering you with the information you need. With my background in IT, I'll provide you with a detailed analysis of this property, including market insights and a clear understanding of its potential value.

Let's connect and discuss how this condo can be the perfect fit for your Metro Manila lifestyle.

Contact:
Oliver M. Liwanag, RE/MAX Capital


Empowering Your Choices, Achieving Your Property Goals – Liwanag Properties

- 𝐃𝐎𝐍 𝐁𝐎𝐒𝐂𝐎 𝐂𝐄𝐍𝐓𝐄𝐑 𝐎𝐅 𝐒𝐓𝐔𝐃𝐈𝐄𝐒
- 𝐏𝐀𝐑𝐄𝐅 𝐖𝐎𝐎𝐃𝐑𝐎𝐒𝐄

~𝐀 𝐍𝐞𝐰𝐥𝐲 𝐋𝐚𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐝 - 𝐏𝐫𝐞-𝐒𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐣𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐨𝐟 𝐑𝐨𝐛𝐢𝐧𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐋𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐂𝐨𝐫𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐨𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐫𝐬: 
✓𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐄𝐱𝐜𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐁𝐔𝐈𝐋𝐃𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐅𝐄𝐀𝐓𝐔𝐑𝐄𝐒 , 𝐀𝐌𝐄𝐍𝐈𝐓𝐈𝐄𝐒 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐔𝐍𝐈𝐓 𝐔𝐏𝐆𝐑𝐀𝐃𝐄𝐒

𝐀𝐯𝐚𝐢𝐥𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝟑 𝐮𝐧𝐢𝐭 𝐭𝐲𝐩𝐞:
𝐒𝐓𝐔𝐃𝐈𝐎 - 𝟐𝟖 𝐬𝐪𝐦
𝟏𝐁𝐑 - 𝟑𝟓𝐬𝐪𝐦
𝐂𝐨𝐫𝐧𝐞𝐫 𝟏 𝐁𝐑- 𝟑𝟓𝐬𝐪𝐦
𝟐𝐁𝐑 -𝟓𝟖 𝐬𝐪𝐦

𝐅𝐨𝐫 𝐯𝐢𝐞𝐰𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐫𝐞𝐪𝐮𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐬 𝐨𝐫 𝐪𝐮𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬, 𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐬𝐞𝐧𝐝 𝐚 𝐩𝐫𝐢𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐦𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐚𝐠𝐞.

𝐕𝐢𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐩𝐡𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐕. 𝐓𝐚𝐛𝐨𝐫
𝐄𝐱𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐭𝐲 𝐒𝐩𝐞𝐜𝐢𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐭
(+𝟔𝟑) 𝟗𝟐𝟕𝟖𝟖𝟏𝟗𝟔𝟔𝟑 ( 𝐕𝐢𝐛𝐞𝐫 )

title: For Sale: Pre-selling Woodsville Crest 1BR Condo Unit at Merville, Paranaque
description:
Live in a master-planned, low-density community, Woodsville Crest, where you can experience exclusive resort-style living within the Metro. With its nature-inspired amenities, spacious unit layouts of a studio, 1-bedroom, and 2-bedroom units, and smart home deliverables, you can recharge and rest at any moment's notice.

Gross Unit Price Range [Price less 4% Launch and 5% Payment Term Discount]:

· Studio: 23.50 sqm at P5.299M Gross Unit Price

· 1-BR: 35.00 sqm at P8.070M Gross Unit Price

· 2-BR: 58.00 sqm at P14.697M Gross Unit Price

Located in a desirable location, Woodsville Crest is only a drive from Makati CBD, Alabang CBD, and Bonifacio Global City, ensuring convenient access to your work and recreational destinations. The community has ground-level amenities, with 60% dedicated to open spaces, and the two-story clubhouse is fully equipped with indoor and outdoor recreational areas. From game rooms to barbecue areas to co-working spaces, there is something for everyone to enjoy.

The building's interior has a beautifully designed layout featuring single-loaded corridors and an open atrium. Each unit comes with modern-day furnishings supportive of your desire for an upgraded home life in the suburbs and a dedicated space for your work-from-home set-up.

Woodsville Crest offers a well-rounded lifestyle with home innovations and features that make every day a vacation. With only nine floors per building, it offers exclusivity and privacy to future homeowners. The community incorporates sustainable development and unit features that make it environmentally sound, allowing residents to live harmoniously with nature.

Investing in Woodsville Crest is an excellent decision because of its accessible location, exclusivity, and privacy. Raise your standard of living and live in harmony with nature.

Contact your seller now for more details and avail of the launch promo for the unit of your choice. Price and availability are subject to change without prior notice—Reserve now for only a P40k reservation fee.

Project Completion: 31 Aug 28 (Pine Tower) I DHSUD LS No. 210 issued 05 Nov 21 (Phase 1), DHSUD TLS No. NCR-01 issued on 31 Jul 23 (Phase2)

title: Woodsville Crest Pre Selling 1 Bedroom 35.00 sqm Condo in Merville Paranaque
description:
🎉𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐬𝐞𝐥𝐟 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐡𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐥𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐚 𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐥 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐇𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐚𝐛𝐫𝐨𝐚𝐝?🎉
 
⭐️𝐖𝐎𝐎𝐃𝐒𝐕𝐈𝐋𝐋𝐄 𝐂𝐑𝐄𝐒𝐓⭐️
📌𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐚𝐭 𝐌𝐞𝐫𝐯𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐞, 𝐏𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐪𝐮𝐞

🔥𝐏𝐚𝐲𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐓𝐞𝐫𝐦𝐬🔥
👉🏻𝟐𝟎% 𝐏𝐚𝐲𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝟔𝟏 𝐌𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐡𝐬 
👉🏻𝟖𝟎% 𝐁𝐚𝐧𝐤 𝐅𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐨𝐫 𝐂𝐚𝐬𝐡

𝐀𝐯𝐚𝐢𝐥𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐬:
✅𝐒𝐓𝐔𝐃𝐈𝐎 𝐔𝐍𝐈𝐓 - 𝟐𝟑.𝟓𝟎 𝐒𝐐𝐌
✅𝐎𝐍𝐄 𝐁𝐄𝐃𝐑𝐎𝐎𝐌 - 𝟑𝟓.𝟎𝟎 𝐒𝐐𝐌 𝐓𝐎 𝟑𝟕.𝟎𝟎 𝐒𝐐𝐌
✅𝐓𝐖𝐎 𝐁𝐄𝐃𝐑𝐎𝐎𝐌 - 𝟓𝟖.𝟎𝟎 𝐒𝐐𝐌

🏡𝐑𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐨𝐧 𝐭𝐨 𝐢𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐬𝐭 𝐚𝐭 𝐖𝐨𝐨𝐝𝐬𝐯𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐞 𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐭
➔𝟏𝟓 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐚𝐰𝐚𝐲 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐍𝐀𝐈𝐀
➔𝐌𝐢𝐝-𝐑𝐢𝐬𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐝𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐢𝐮𝐦 
➔𝟑% 𝐭𝐨 𝟒% 𝐋𝐚𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐡𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐜𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐭 
➔𝐏𝐞𝐭 𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐮𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐲 
➔𝐁𝐢𝐜𝐲𝐜𝐥𝐞 𝐏𝐚𝐫𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠 
➔𝐒𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐇𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐭

🏢𝐒𝐜𝐡𝐨𝐨𝐥𝐬 
▶️𝐀𝐬𝐢𝐚 𝐏𝐚𝐜𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐜 𝐂𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐠𝐞 
▶️𝐃𝐨𝐧 𝐁𝐨𝐬𝐜𝐨 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐧𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥 
▶️𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐭𝐮𝐭𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐤𝐚𝐭𝐢 𝐂𝐢𝐭𝐲 
▶️𝐏𝐀𝐓𝐓𝐒 𝐂𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐠𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐀𝐞𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐬 
▶️𝐄𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐮𝐧 𝐂𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐠𝐞 
▶️𝐂𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐠𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐒𝐚𝐧 𝐀𝐠𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐧
▶️𝐒𝐭. 𝐏𝐚𝐮𝐥 𝐂𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐠𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐏𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐪𝐮𝐞 
▶️𝐃𝐞 𝐋𝐚 𝐒𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐞 𝐒𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐚𝐠𝐨 𝐙𝐨𝐛𝐞𝐥 𝐒𝐜𝐡𝐨𝐨𝐥

🏥𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐥𝐭𝐡𝐜𝐚𝐫𝐞 
▶️𝐏𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐪𝐮𝐞 𝐃𝐨𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬 𝐇𝐨𝐬𝐩𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 
▶️𝐀𝐬𝐢𝐚𝐧 𝐇𝐨𝐬𝐩𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐌𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐂𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫 

🏬𝐌𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐬/𝐒𝐡𝐨𝐩𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐂𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬 
▶️𝐑𝐨𝐛𝐢𝐧𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐤𝐞𝐭 𝐖𝐨𝐨𝐝𝐬𝐯𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐞 𝐕𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐥𝐥 
▶️𝐒𝐌 𝐂𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐁𝐢𝐜𝐮𝐭𝐚𝐧 
▶️𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐬 𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝 𝐌𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐥𝐚 
▶️𝐒&𝐑 𝐒𝐮𝐜𝐚𝐭 
▶️𝐁𝐆𝐂 
▶️𝐀𝐥𝐚𝐛𝐚𝐧𝐠 𝐓𝐨𝐰𝐧 𝐂𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫
▶️𝐅𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐥𝐥
